title: Smart Data Models - WindPitchContEmulIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Pitch control emulator model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindPitchContEmulIEC

WindGenTurbineType2IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 2 model with which this Pitch control emulator model is associated. Default: None

kdroop.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power error gain (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kipce.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pitch control emulator integral constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

komegaaero.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Aerodynamic power change vs. omegachange (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kppce.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pitch control emulator proportional constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

omegaref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rotor speed in initial steady state (omega). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

pimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum steady state power (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

pimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum steady state power (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First time constant in pitch control lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second time constant in pitch control lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tpe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant in generator air gap power lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0
